Detailed Description

An OutChannelFile is an implementation of OutChannel in order to store messages into file.

ChannelFile

Member Function Documentation

void FT::ChannelFile::initialize (  )  [protected]

Initialize a ChannelFile

Reimplemented in FT::OChannelFile, and FT::IChannelFile.

void FT::ChannelFile::setup ( int  fd,
std::ios::openmode  m 
) [protected]

Setup the ChannelFile with network and openmod Open mode for the file are std::ios::out or std::ios::in.

  • std::ios::out allows to write to the file the content of data describes into channel.
  • std::ios::in allows to read the data of channel in order to call the service with the message.
    Parameters:
    fd the open file descriptor that will be closed into terminate
    m the direction mode (output xor input)
void FT::ChannelFile::terminate (  )  [protected]

Destructor Depending on the open mode of the file, flush the write to the file or call the server stub (skel) from the file.

Reimplemented in FT::OChannelFile, and FT::IChannelFile.
